title: The Man Who Came Too Much
description: Chet Flood has a unique problem. Or talent, depending on how you look at it. As Chet himself says, "When I cum, I fill jars." Follow Chet through some of his most formative and hilarious encounters as he learns to deal with the aftermath of his formidable talent. Bring your wading boots. Dust off your umbrella. You might just get soaked in this explicit, comic re-telling - in Chet's own words!
author: Ellie Saxx
